title: snowflake.core.stream.StreamResource | Snowflake Documentation
paragraphs: Represents a reference to a Snowflake Stream resource.

With this stream reference, you can create, update, and fetch information about streams, as well
as perform certain actions on them.

if_exists (bool, optional) – Check the existence of this stream before dropping it.
Default is None, which is equivalent to False.
